EmailTemplate.description: send mail to AMS team when RO4W status is Cancelled
EmailTemplate.name: Send Mail To AMS Team
EmailTemplate.subject: RO4W cancelled in FET
EmailTemplate.textOnly: The RO4W {!FS_Installation__c.Name} linked to Case {!FS_Installation__c.Related_Case__c} has been cancelled. Please review the case and take appropriate actions.
